transcript.title: ORDER OF AUSTRALIA KNIGHTHOOD FOR PRINCE CHARLES
transcript.content:
EMBARGO
PRIME MINISTER
FOR PRESS: FRIDAY, 27 MARCH,'
Order of Australia Knighthood for PrinceCharles
I am delighted that Her Majesty The Queen, as Sovereign
of the Order of Australia, has appointed His Royal Highness
The Prince of Wales to be a Knight of the Order. On behalf
of the Government and people of Australia, I congratulate
His Royal Highness most sincerely.
. I am particularly pleased that the announcement has
been made at this time, on the day of the Privy Council
meeting in London at which Her Majesty The Queen will signify
her agreement to the marriage between His Royal Highness and
The Lady Diana Spencer. The Australian Government is
represented at that meeting by the Deputy Prime Minister,
Mr Anthony. His Excellency the Governor-General will present the
insignia of the Order to His Royal Highness while he is in
Australia on his forthcoming visit. This will give pleasure
to us all..-000---
EMBARGO
Not to be published in the-press or broadcast over radio
and TV stations in Australia before 1800 hours EST on
Friday 27 March; Not to be-broadcast on shortwave radio
before 2100 hours EST ( 1100 GMT) on Friday 27 March 1981;
May be telegraphed or ' cabled beyond Australi a provided that
subsequent publication or broadcast in an overseas country
is not before 1100 hours GMT ( 2100 EST) on Friday
27 March 1981.
EMBARGO 21
1981
